timeline.bodyText: violation is on "default" token, please move ok comment on the line with "default"

timeline.diffHunk:

  * <module name="DefaultComesLast"/>

- * To configure the check for skipIfLastAndSharedWithCase: + *

Example:

+ * 
+ * switch (i) {
+ *   case 1:
+ *     break;
+ *   case 2:
+ *     break;
+ *   default:
+ *     break; // OK

timeline.bodyText: , with the new option is expected this can be removed
